title: Frontend Engineer
description: Build responsive web interfaces using React, optimize performance and collaborate with design.

title: Backend Developer
description: Design and implement RESTful APIs, maintain database schema and ensure reliable deployments.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data, create dashboards and deliver actionable insights to stakeholders.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter, write unit and integration tests.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automate infrastructure, manage CI/CD pipelines and monitor production systems.

title: UX Designer
description: Lead user research, create wireframes and prototypes, and collaborate closely with engineers.

title: QA Engineer (Contract)
description: Write automated tests, perform manual testing and validate release quality on a contract basis.

title: Product Manager
description: Define product roadmap, coordinate cross-functional teams and measure product success.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop ML models, productionize pipelines and optimize inference performance.

title: Customer Success Specialist
description: Support customers with onboarding, maintain satisfaction metrics and drive retention.
